meanings.definition: strange or odd in an interesting or amusing way
meanings.sent1: The clown wore the queerest hat at the circus.
meanings.sent2: It was the queerest thing I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fascination with the vacuum cleaner was the queerest sight.
meanings.sent4: Her choice of outfit was the queerest mix of colors.
meanings.sent5: The old house had the queerest creaks and groans at night.

meanings.definition: to make or become queer or strange
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick managed to queerest the audience.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected turn of events queered the plan.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle too many tasks can queerest your schedule.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious fog queered the path ahead.
meanings.sent5: A sudden gust of wind queered the kite's flight.
